page.title: 09ENTERTAINMENT SEAHOUSES
page.content: Although Seahouses depends so much on tourists for its income it is too small to provide all the activities found in larger seaside resorts. There is no cinema or theatre nor is there a swimming pool. The entertainments available are: Three Amusement Arcades and Two Bingo Halls which are permanent. During the summer, Slater's Travelling Fair visits the village for the whole of the month of August bringing the Big Wheel, Octopus and similar rides together with side shows. Also during the school holiday period there is a BEACH MISSION which provides entertainment on the sands every morning for the children.
